txt.en:
<rgb=#66ffff>In Rohirrim</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>The power of runes and speech are used to creating a mending and inspiring oration.</rgb>

<rgb=#66ffff>In Riddermark</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>The power of speech and runes are woven together to draw one's attention to the bleak sky, calling ruin and fear from above.</rgb>

<rgb=#66ffff>In Red Dawn</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>The power of speech and runes are woven together to draw upon the power of potent embers to burn the target and potentially weaken them to flame.</rgb>
